name: bazel-kotlin-vscode-extension
description: Extension to support Bazel with Kotlin Language Server

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.path.description: Optionally a custom path to the language server executable.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.transport.description: The transport layer beneath the language server protocol. Note that the extension will launch the server even if a TCP socket is used.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.port.description: The port to which the client will attempt to connect to. A random port is used if zero. Only used if the transport layer is TCP.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.debugAttach.en.description: [DEBUG] Whether the language server should listen for debuggers, i.e. be debuggable while running in VSCode. This is ONLY useful if you need to debug the language server ITSELF.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.debugAttach.po.description: [DEBUG] If transport is stdio this enables you to attach to the running language server with a debugger. This is ONLY useful if you need to debug the language server ITSELF.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.debugAttach.au.description: [DEBUG] If enabled (together with debugAttach.enabled), the language server will not immediately launch but instead listen on the specified attach port and wait for a debugger. This is ONLY useful if you need to debug the language server ITSELF.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.watchFiles.description: Specifies glob patterns of files, which would be watched by LSP client. The LSP client doesn't support watching files outside a workspace folder.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the Kotlin language server.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.compiler.jvm.t.description: Specifies the JVM target, e.g. "1.6" or "1.8"

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.diagnostics.en.description: Whether diagnostics (e.g. errors or warnings from the Kotlin compiler) should be emitted.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.diagnostics.le.description: The minimum severity of diagnostics to emit.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.diagnostics.de.description: [DEBUG] Specifies the debounce time limit. Lower to increase responsiveness at the cost of possible stability issues.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.linting.deboun.deprecationMessage: The option has been renamed to `brex.kotlinLanguageServer.diagnostics.debounceTime`
brex.kotlinLanguageServer.linting.deboun.description: [DEBUG] Specifies the debounce time limit. Lower to increase responsiveness at the cost of possible stability issues.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.scripts.buildS.description: Whether language features are provided for .gradle.kts scripts. Experimental and may not work properly.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.indexing.enabl.description: Whether global symbols in the project should be indexed automatically in the background. This enables e.g. code completion for unimported classes and functions.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.completion.sni.description: Specifies whether code completion should provide snippets (true) or plain-text items (false).

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.debugAdapter.e.description: [Recommended] Specifies whether the debug adapter should be used. When enabled a debugger for Kotlin will be available.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.debugAdapter.p.description: Optionally a custom path to the debug adapter executable.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.debounceTime.description: [DEPRECATED] Specifies the debounce time limit. Lower to increase responsiveness at the cost of possible stability issues.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.externalSource.description: [Recommended] Specifies whether URIs inside JARs should be represented using the 'kls'-scheme.
Specifies whether decompiled/external classes should be auto-converted to Kotlin.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.snippetsEnable.description: [DEPRECATED] Specifies whether code completion should provide snippets (true) or plain-text items (false).

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.inlayHints.typ.description: Whether to provide inlay hints for types on declaration sites or not.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.inlayHints.par.description: Whether to provide inlay hints for parameters on call sites or not.

brex.kotlinLanguageServer.inlayHints.cha.description: Whether to provide inlay hints on chained function calls or not.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
